name: Dump Truck Trax Simulation
description:
Do you think parking games are fun ?
Think again especially When it is a Dump Truck Trax on offroad terrains. These parking games require precise control, quick reflexes, and a good sense of timing. Parking your Dump Truck Trax in the correct space, within a time limit, and without crashing into things or even worse fall down from the cliff is more challenging than you might think, but practice makes perfect.

Features:
* Impressive 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Brilliant Missions
* Addictive Experience
* Easy Game Play
* Real Physics
